Question: This person won Golden Globe awards for Best Actress and Best Supporting Actress for her two roles that year.
Hints: In 1967, at the age of 18, this person visited Israel and volunteered on a kibbutz for several months.
This person has done voice work in television and film.
This person appeared two years later as Warrant Officer/Lieutenant Ellen Ripley in Ridley Scott's blockbuster 1979 film Alien.
